column5: Here it is, You and a buddy are going fishing for the weekend. You are going to a lake you have never been to before. You think it has bass pike muskie and other game fish in it. You are under the impression that you are packing "light". You are allowed to bring the following: One plastic container full of soft plastics lures whatever. (The container should hold no more than 10 lures) and 2 rods.  I got this idea from a friend.    I would bring a medium action 6'6 spinning combo, and a 7" medium heavy spinning combo. As for the lures: One deep running crankbait, one shallow running crankbait, one shallow running jerkbait, white spinnerbait, black blue bass jig, yum dingers, berkly gulp jerk shad, topwater popper, silver spoon, and a buzzbait.
This thread was just done 1 or 2 days ago
Would you be able to tell me what page it's on, cant find it
I'd bring a 7" medium heavy baitcaset combo (Compre/Calcutta 251) and a bunch of large spinner baits in various colors.
Yeah, there are a lot of threads.  I should have included it the first time:   http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=18070&hl=  forrest
